s0117: Lord Pingyuan heard this and told his wife: 'I once thought your brother the prince unmatched in the world, but now he frivolously befriends gamblers and ale sellers.'
s0119: The prince took leave of the wife and departed, saying: 'I once heard Lord Pingyuan was worthy, so I betrayed the King of Wei to rescue Zhao and match him.
s0126: Lord Pingyuan's retainers heard this. Half left Lord Pingyuan and went to the prince. Scholars throughout the world again came to attach themselves to the prince.
s0155: Though the world's princes also have those who love scholars, Lord Xinling's reception of hermits from rocky caves, not ashamed to associate with inferiors, has good reason.
